name: GTFO (itch) (Asto)
description:
GTFO is a dungeon crawler game in which you start with nothing – not even light! Ok, they left you your underpants. It's not 18+.

Your goal is, obviously, to escape this maze and you will recognize, that you need to find some items first.

You know WASD, right?

The Spacebar is also very important. It does everything else.

Have fun!
